info.text: I bear knowledge of the great secrets of biology
I shall begin your quest for knowledge as you lie on my skin. Skin, the vital organ of the integumentary
Although the skin protects me from the rays of UV and keeps my tempature stable through sweat,
I shall allow you into my nose so you may explore and learn the knowledge of Body Systems.
(For the low price of $49.99, comes with the purchase of a Mastering Biology Textbook)
After discovering the rest of the integumentary, I allow you to pass through into the immune system even if other pathogens are stopped.
